actions.name: Bull-Headed
actions.description: Effect: The user's single target attacks with the [Contact] keyword deal 50% increased damage. However all single target attacks without the [Contact] keyword have a -2 ACC penalty.

system.description: Effect: The user's single target attacks with the [Contact] keyword deal 50% increased damage. However all single target attacks without the [Contact] keyword have a -2 ACC penalty.
